author: Liz Rowley
title: The Story of a Coronavirus Infection
description: Over the course of the epidemic, the CDC has estimated that between 160 million and 214 million people in the United States could become infected.
content:
By Liz Rowley
Social distancing can be a mentally, emotionally, and physically taxing responsibility. But for now, it remains our one true weapon in the war against a virus that has wreaked absolute havoc on our world  and on life as we know it. Over the cou… [+271 chars]
